mockit.integration.junit4
Class BlockJUnit4ClassRunnerDecorator

java.lang.Object
  mockit.integration.TestRunnerDecorator
      mockit.integration.junit4.BlockJUnit4ClassRunnerDecorator

@MockClass(realClass=org.junit.runners.model.FrameworkMethod.class)
public final class BlockJUnit4ClassRunnerDecorator
extends TestRunnerDecorator

Startup mock that modifies the JUnit 4.5+ test runner so that it calls back to JMockit immediately after every test executes. When that happens, JMockit will assert any expectations set during the test, including expectations specified through Mock as well as in Expectations subclasses.

This class is not supposed to be accessed from user code. JMockit will automatically load it at startup.
